snippet: A selected guide to theater performances in New York.

Amazon.com, which never talks about how its products are doing beyond the vaguest terms, issued a press release Thursday saying it was selling Kindle e-readers and tablets at the rate of a million devices a week for the last three weeks. But it ga...
abstract: Amazon.com, which never talks about how its products are doing beyond the vaguest terms, issued a press release Thursday saying it was selling Kindle e-readers and tablets at the rate of a million devices a week for the last three weeks. But it gave no breakdown as to how many of those devices were its new tablet, the Kindle Fire, which is popular but controversial.

headline.main: Smelling a Hit, Amazon Opens Up About the Kindle

headline.main: Smelling a Hit, Amazon Opens Up About the Kindle

snippet: The writer of an unofficial manual for Amazon’s Kindle Fire says that the tablet has design flaws that never would have passed muster at Apple. But, he said, the Fire is not made for Apple customers.
abstract: The writer of an unofficial manual for Amazon’s Kindle Fire says that the tablet has design flaws that never would have passed muster at Apple. But, he said, the Fire is not made for Apple customers.

headline.print_headline: The Kindle Fire And a Debate On Tablets

snippet: The writer of an unofficial manual for Amazon's Kindle Fire says that the tablet has design flaws that never would have passed muster at Apple. But, he added, the Fire is not made for the type of people who buy Apple products -- or for critics who...
abstract: The writer of an unofficial manual for Amazon's Kindle Fire says that the tablet has design flaws that never would have passed muster at Apple. But, he added, the Fire is not made for the type of people who buy Apple products -- or for critics who review gadgets.

snippet: Corrections appearing in print on December 15, 2011.
“Lysistrata Jones” is a throwback to the perishable good-time musicals in which peppy kids delivered of-the-moment jokes and lively dances.
abstract: Ben Brantley reviews Transport Group Theater production of Douglas Carter Beane play Lysistrata Jones at Walter Kerr Theater; Dan Knechtges directs and Patti Murin stars.

snippet: As consumers migrate to mobile apps, app-related search engines and stores, especially for Android, have vastly improved this year.
abstract: Bob Tedeschi App Smart column observes that, as consumers migrate to mobile apps, app-related search engines and stores, especially for Android, have vastly improved during 2011.

headline.main: Searching for Apps Is Finally Getting Easier
